file_content.text: The scavengers weaken, and the Jedi corruption fades. Taris's ruin is preserved.
Have you found the Jedi?
Excellent.
The Jedi will think twice before challenging the resolve of the Sith.
You have performed well, agent. Too many Imperials lack the stomach for victory.
Lesser hunters would have shied away from the job. But you proved your superior strength. Your payment is deserved.
Compassion is the Jedi's weakness. Thankfully you are not so frail.
The Jedi infected the scavengers with hope. Now they must all perish.
The Jedi are close.
They hide in the shadows. Can't you feel their foul presence? Like bile choking your throat?
They hide, staining Taris with their corruption, healing wounds best left raw.
They hide because they lack strength. That is why their restoration of Taris will fail.
The Jedi are pathetic.
Still, they are a threat.
Their weakness disgusts me. If they had any strength, they'd face us.
Nothing is fouler than Jedi.
Despite their frailty, they have proven poisonous.
The Jedi will show themselves. And when they do, we will take the necessary action.
They can't hide forever.
They insult our heritage of ruin with every breath. We mustn't wait any longer.
Sounds like someone wants these Jedi dead.
Do I smell a Jedi hunt?
Darth Gravus calls for the blood of all who dare repair the ruined planet.
What hole did those Jedi crawl into?
Where are they?
I can't be sure. They have evaded our assassins.
You're obsessed.
I can't divert my attention while they still poison Taris.
The Jedi lurk in the wilds, helping the scavengers rebuild and training the fools to resist us.
Their volunteer militia has already spilled Imperial blood. They and their masters must learn a lesson.
Ignite your lightsaber, unleash the dark side on the scavenger soldiers and the Jedi will seek you out. Then, destroy them.
Execute the scavenger soldiers, and the Jedi will come to stop you. Then soak Taris with their blood.
Lay a trap for the Jedi, using the scavenger soldiers as bait. Kill enough, and the Jedi will find you.
Slay the scavenger soldiers. When enough lie broken at your feet, the Jedi will come for you.
I will kill every last Jedi.
Good, you understand what it takes. So few do.
I'm sorry it's come to this.
The Jedi vermin brought this on themselves. Relish this moment.
Serenade the Jedi with the screams of the innocent. When they emerge from hiding, leave no survivors.
That's awful. [Refuse quest]
The Jedi's weakness infects you. Leave me.
The Jedi are close. I can feel them.
